quest.name: No Sea Wasp for You
journal: Sthalrhet hopes to send you out on a hunt.
Sthalrhet asks you to eradicate sea wasps so that his brother will not have the opportunity to delight in them.
Deliver the sea wasps you have culled to Sthalrhet.
Sthalrhet savors his brother's misfortune, and is happy to give the sea wasps to anyone who is not Nortmoen.
objectives: Slay sea wasps and obtain their rotting umbrellas.
Deliver the rotting umbrellas to Sthalrhet.

dialogue.name: STHALRHET
dialogue.text: You seem an adventurer in need of work, and here I am a man in need of dead sea wasps. Perhaps we might help each other.

dialogue.name: STHALRHET
dialogue.text: Mind you, I've no interest in chewing on the viscous vermin myself, but my brother can't seem to get enough of them, the uncouth cad.

dialogue.name: STHALRHET
dialogue.text: I'll not stand to watch him stuff his gob full of those prickly pests one more day! Ah, what I wouldn't give to see the look on his face when I tell him you've hunted down all his precious sea wasps! But don't expect me to reward you without proofâ”€I'll need to see their rotting carcasses first.

dialogue.name: STHALRHET
dialogue.text: I trust you're busy delivering those sea wasp souls to the deep? Just make sure you don't give their corpses to my brother!

dialogue.name: STHALRHET
dialogue.text: Now this is what I deem a proper slaughter! Excellent.

dialogue.name: STHALRHET
dialogue.text: All that remains is to determine how to dispose of the wretched things. I suppose there must be somebody in my brigade that can stomach them...
